Title: Saving Mr. Banks
Actors: Emma Thompson, Tom Hanks, Annie Rose Buckley, Colin Farrell
Plot: Author P.L. Travers reflects on her childhood after reluctantly meeting with Walt Disney, who seeks to adapt her Mary Poppins books for the big screen.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 14 wins & 72 nominations.
Production: Ruby Films, Essential Media and Entertainment
